titles.title: Zika Response and Safety Act of 2016
A bill to authorize the use of Ebola funds for Zika response and preparedness.
Zika Response and Safety Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Zika Response and Safety Act of 2016
This bill authorizes funds made available in prior appropriation Acts to any federal agency for Ebola response and preparedness to be used for Zika virus response and preparedness.
